replies.author: 乙烯_中国
replies.txt_content:
乙烯_中国 发表于 2015-5-14 02:05
看样子楼主想要那种软件资源啊，这里有一个贴吧的帖子，正好就是生成器，昨天晚上刚出来的，还热乎着呢
htt ...
嘛。。。居然不能编辑了。。。这里还有一个能够生成单指令的mce滤器，楼主自己取用
http://pan.baidu.com/s/1mgj6M2O

replies.author: 凋零蛋
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: MsYqgzt
replies.txt_content: 大概知道一些原理，就是在命令方块上生成一个骑着命令方块的骑着命令方块的.......的命令方块（就是骑着N个命令方块），再给命令方块不同的命令附加值，十分高能...

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: 应该是用summon指令召唤出一个建筑是这样吗

replies.author: 乙烯_中国
replies.txt_content:
看样子楼主想要那种软件资源啊，这里有一个贴吧的帖子，正好就是生成器，昨天晚上刚出来的，还热乎着呢
http://tieba.baidu.com/p/3760620643
贴里是说明，然后下载地址我也放在这里了，http://pan.baidu.com/s/1dDGUYFf 
然后呢，把你想要的指令打进这个生成器就好了

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content:
在如下命令基础上做修改

/summon FallingSand ~ ~5 ~ {Block:redstone_block,Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/fill ~-1 ~ ~ ~-1 ~-5 ~ minecraft:redstone_block"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/setblock ~ ~-24 ~5 unpowered_comparator 4"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/d"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/setblock ~0 ~1 ~0 minecraft:redstone_block 0 destroy"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/setblock ~1 ~-1 ~ redstone_block"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/fill ~1 ~ ~ ~1 ~-3 ~ redstone_block"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/clone ~ ~3 ~1 ~ ~3 ~-1 ~ ~-20 ~6"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/fill ~1 ~ ~ ~1 ~-3 ~ redstone_block"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/setblock ~ ~-17 ~7 stone"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/setblock ~ ~-16 ~7 redstone_block 0 replace"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/fill ~1 ~ ~ ~1 ~-5 ~ redstone_block"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/testfor @e[type=Snowball]"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/clone ~ ~1 ~ ~ ~1 ~ ~ ~-13 ~6"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/kill @e[type=Villager]"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/clear @p snowball"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/fill ~1 ~ ~ ~1 ~-9 ~ redstone_block"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/execute @p ~ ~ ~ summon Villager ~1 ~ ~ {Invulnerable:1,CustomName:Bob,Profession:0,Career:1,Offers:{Recipes:[{buy:{id:pumpkin_pie,Count:10},sell:{id:emerald,Count:1}}]}}"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/clone ~ ~1 ~ ~ ~1 ~ ~ ~-8 ~4"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/setblock ~1 ~-7 ~4 redstone_wire"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/kill @e[type=Snowball]"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/clone ~ ~1 ~ ~ ~1 ~ ~1 ~-5 ~5"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/gamerule doTileDrops false"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/gamerule commandBlockOutput false"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/say Done!"},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command: "/give @p snowball"},Time:1,DropItem:0}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}
